summary: A complete retexture of the salmon fish.
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NPm7ZRb.png[/IMG][/center]

This is a complete retexture of the Salmon texture and normal maps.

[b]Remember that the images are .JPEG compressed and merely illustrative. Test in-game to see the full quality![/b]

[b][u]There are 2 versions available:[/u][/b]

1K: 1024x512 (recommended)
512: 512x256 (for low-end PCs)

To install it just extract the content to Skyrim main folder (where the TESV.exe is located).

[u]MY OTHER MODS[/u]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32505/]Skyrim Project Optimization[/url]: What it does is to use occlusions to optimize and improve performance on interiors .

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29253/]Remove Interior Fog V2[/url]: What it does is to remove the ambient fog on all interiors, making them darker and more realistic.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/40922/]Improved Vanilla Mountains HD[/url]: A texture improvement for the vanilla mountains/rocks textures.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/40937]Solitude dragonhead HD[/url]: A texture improvement for the Solitude dragonhead.


[b]DONT FORGET TO ENDORSE IF YOU LIKE![/b]

[u][b]CREDITS:[/b][/u]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/283020]Brumbek[/url]: for a custom alpha channel.
author: rgabriel15

files.name: Salmon Texture HD 1K
files.changelogHtml: Changed the alpha channel in salmon01.dds to improve the transparency in the tail and flippers. Tks to Brumbek for providing me the custom alpha.

files.name: Salmon Texture HD 512
files.changelogHtml: Changed the alpha channel in salmon01.dds to improve the transparency in the tail and flippers. Tks to Brumbek for providing me the custom alpha.
